title: Séjourne: A Requiem in the Key of Ash
tagline: In a city of lost causes, a writer chases a melody that could unravel reality itself.
themes: The Gothic South as a Living Character

chapters.title: The Milk and the Cathedral Eyes
A Chorus of Ghosts on Rampart
First Rule: Don't Name the Saints
The Cost of a Clean Slate

story: Write a 'found document' from Alma's archive: a grocery list, a diary entry, or a faded photograph with a cryptic caption that hints at a forgotten history of Séjourne.

Create a character who is a 'living record'—a busker on Royal Street whose songs accidentally reveal other people's memories, or a bartender who serves 'tonics' that induce specific, curated forgetfulness.
Draft a scene where a minor character from the novel (Mr. Leoni, the editor, the toppled angel) encounters a 'beat'—a moment of raw, arrhythmic truth—and describe how it changes them.
Imagine a 'prequel' vignette showing the fire at the jazz club on Rampart, told from the perspective of the saxophone that survived, its brass still warm with the last note played.
technical: Build a 'Gothic Atmosphere Generator' that combines sensory details (smell of ozone & old books, sound of a broken bell, texture of peeling paint) with Southern Gothic archetypes to create instant setting prompts.
Develop a 'Constrained Writing' web tool where users must write a 500-word story using only words from the novel's first chapter, exploring how limitation breeds creative freedom.

cover_prompt: A lone writer, hunched over a typewriter in a rain-lashed garret, his fingers bleeding onto the keys as spectral musical notes swirl from the machine, [in a decaying, gaslit New Orleans courtyard apartment choked with ivy and forgotten manuscripts, where the architecture itself seems to weep and the air vibrates with a silent, haunting melody], in the atmospheric style of Dave McKean's photomontage mixed-media and Ashley Wood's expressive, ink-splattered despair, [book cover framing, extreme close-up on the bleeding hands and escaping notes with the writer's tormented face in shallow focus behind, Dutch angle to enhance disorientation], [dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a single, sickly gaslamp casting long, grasping shadows, color palette of bruised purples, arterial crimson, and the ashen grey of burnt paper and forgotten ghosts], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
